import React from 'react' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../StyleSheets/RecipeCardStyle.css'; import { Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; export default function RecipeCard({ recipe }) { return (
< Row className="card-alignment" >

{recipe.recipename}

{recipe.contributor}

{recipe.steps}

{/* {recipeList.map((recipe) => {
{recipe.recipename}

{recipe.contributor}

})} */}
) } {/*
< Row className="card-alignment" >

Lemon Shrimp Linguine

Kristina

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

*/}
